xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.7 Pañhāvāra » 16.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 16.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Micchattaniyatattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
58.
2408Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate terasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2409Anulomaṃ.
<< 16.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
